dialogue.speaker: King Arin
dialogue.text: Welcome, brave adventurer, to the land of Eldoria! I am King Arin, ruler of this realm.

dialogue.speaker: Adventurer (Eira)
dialogue.text: Your Majesty, it's an honor to meet you. I've heard rumors of a dark force threatening the land. Is there truth to this?

dialogue.speaker: King Arin
dialogue.text: I'm afraid so, Eira. A dark sorcerer has risen in power and seeks to conquer our lands. I need brave warriors like yourself to help defeat him.
